abstract: The Upshot; Facebook's experimental partnership with nine major news organizations represents social network's latest effort to become universal gateway to the digital world; deal will allow publications to reach wider audience, but involves ceding their direct relationship with readers, shift that some say was already well underway.
lead_paragraph: Instant articles shift the relationship between publications and readers, by ceding an essential element of control. But that is already happening.

headline.main: Why Facebook’s News Experiment Matters to Readers
headline.print_headline: Facebook Experiment Alters Who Controls Media’s Relationship With Readers

snippet: Instant articles shift the relationship between publications and readers, by ceding an essential element of control. But that is already happening.
